name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Competitors App - Monitor competitors' LinkedIn and Facebook pages

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: competitors.app monitor all your competitors moves

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Competitors App helps marketers monitor their competitors marketing moves in one place, with very little time investment.

Monitor competitor website changes and learn his strategy, an improvement, something that didn't work well and now it is better.

We use the Google Chrome extension to make sure you get notifications when your competitors post or update their social media channels.

On our official Competitors App website, we monitor a lot more channels.

Stay up to date with your competitors blog, Linkedin, Facebook and Instagram. Know when they write and what is their most effective posts.
